content:
EINST4INE is recruiting for 15 Early Stage Research projects - applications close 25 April 2021 (8pm CET)

The European Training Network for InduStry Digital Transformation across Innovation Ecosystems, also known as EINST4INE, is a consortium of 7 European academic and non-academic beneficiaries, plus 2 academic and 15 industry partners working in the domain of industrial digital transformation.

https://www.einst4ine.eu
